about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi! I'm Angel, a mechatronics engineering student from Acapulco, Guerrero, a picturesque town on the coast of Mexico. As an inhabitant of a coastal town, I love the sea and the beach.
about.content1: Back to academics, I have the ability to excel in programming projects, electronics and a little bit of mechanics.
about.content2: Speaking of me, in my free time, I enjoy both solitude and the company of my friends, although I'm not exactly the life of the party hahaha. I also like to immerse myself in music, of all genres, but my favorite band is The 1975, as you can see below.
